review_data.title: Abendsonne geniessen da langsamer Service.

review_data.title: Trip to Switzerland.

review_data.title: Not cheap, but good...
review_data.content: Evening in this place ( May 2015 ) was quite good ( except the band - not for music, but for loudness ), beer little bit more expensive, than normal... Very nice river -view and the meal also good. Overall ? Nice 75%.

review_data.title: 7 days in Zurich
review_data.content: This is a typical Beer Keller type of pub. There is live music every night. Good food and reasonable prices and very nice and helpful staff. I personally loved it and would recommend you visit.

review_data.title: Excellent place to have a nice evening

review_data.title: Great music, great biers, great times!

review_data.title: Fantastic Traditional live music

review_data.title: Bierstube with live music
review_data.content: This is the right place if you feel like having beers with your friends. Most of the guests are rather older. The food is simple but good. The live music is all about "Schlager" bands.

review_data.title: Location is great

review_data.title: Pub with added oom-pah !

review_data.title: Recomendo

review_data.title: Good ambience, ok food

review_data.title: Crazy bavarian Bar !
review_data.content: Loved this bar- every night while we were there this bar was full of folk dressed in traditional Bavarian costume with a band singing, the beer flowing and everyone up dancing ! A real contrast to my former image of buttoned up Swiss folk :)

review_data.title: Freakshow inklusive
review_data.content: Ein absolutes Traditionslokal von Zürich. Nebst dem guten Essen und der Musik bieten auch die verschiedensten Gäste hervorragende Unterhaltung.

review_data.title: Good location average food

review_data.title: If you are here- come in- never see so much dancing retired ladies

review_data.title: Highlight of Zurich
